name: Extinction
storyline: Extinction is a short but immersive singleplayer horror game where you play as a young traveler who is exploring an abandoned valley called "The valley of Extinction. Your role is to explore different places in the valley of Extinction such as a deep, dark forest and an old basement. In these places you will find different possessed monsters who want to kill you. Trying to survive will soon be in your best interest...
summary: Extinction is a singleplayer horror game where you explore The valley of Extinction. Your job is to explore it while also keeping yourself alive from monsters who want to end your life. Extinction contains a linear singleplayer horror experience, in which you will solve different puzzles, explore different, haunted places and most importantly try to survive.
